title: Sample Project Estimation
description: A sample project demonstrating the JSON estimator format with multiple phases and tasks.

phases.title: Setup & Configuration
phases.objective: Initialize project structure and development environment

tasks.title: Project Initialization
tasks.description: Set up the initial project structure with configuration files, dependencies, and development tooling.
acceptanceCriteria: All configuration files are created and valid

tasks.title: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
tasks.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: CI pipeline runs on every push
Deployment triggers on main branch merge

tasks.title: User Interface Components
tasks.description: Create the main UI components including layout, navigation, and reusable elements.
acceptanceCriteria: Layout is responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop

tasks.title: Data Management Layer
tasks.description: Implement data fetching, state management, caching, and data transformation logic.
acceptanceCriteria: Data fetches correctly from all API endpoints
State updates are predictable and debuggable
Errors are handled gracefully with user feedback

risk.description: External API dependency may cause integration challenges

tasks.title: Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement user authentication including login, logout, session management, and protected routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register and login successfully
Password reset emails are sent correctly

phases.title: Testing & Documentation
phases.objective: Ensure code quality and provide comprehensive documentation

tasks.title: Unit and Integration Testing
tasks.description: Write comprehensive tests for all components and features.
deliverables: Unit tests for all utility functions
Component tests with React Testing Library
Mock service worker setup for API mocking
acceptanceCriteria: All tests pass in CI pipeline

tasks.title: Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers and end users.
acceptanceCriteria: New developers can set up project following README
Architecture decisions are recorded and justified
